channel.title: Helppp!

item.title: Helppp!
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

hey
my makemem command doesnt work properly…
i type ::makemem and then kick the person and they go into the ‘members.txt’ list , but theyre still not member.
how do i make the command change their ‘playerIsMember’ bit in character files?

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerRights >= 1)) { { try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

Read full topic
